  • Constructor Details

    • StandAloneMonitorThread

      public StandAloneMonitorThread(ServerStatus serverStatus, ConnectionMonitor connectionMonitor, int delay, int exceptionDelay)
      Creates the monitor thread with the given delay seconds.
      Parameters:
      serverStatus - server status
      connectionMonitor - connection monitor
      delay - the number of seconds between each poll
      exceptionDelay - the number of seconds to wait should an error occur
